concept.title: Manual Inspection of Drawband and Mainspring
concept.shortdesc: Visual and manual inspection of the drawband and mainspring helps identify loosened connections and reduced tension that affect carriage performance.

ul.li: Move your carriage to the right side of your typewriter.
Visually inspect the drawband to see if it has loosened or disconnected from the mainspring barrel.
Manually rotate the mainspring barrel to reveal if the barrel maintains tension or moves freely.
Lack of resistance indicates loss of spring tension and potential need for repair.
